name: Zero-Two-Md
description: A Whatsapp md bot build with nodejs

SESSION_ID.description: Session ID which you Acquired from https//ZeroTwoMd.tech/#qrcode, if you don't have go on that link

BOT_OWNER.description: The phone numbers of the users who you want to be admin for the bot (should be in international format without + and multiple numbers must be separated by a comma ",")

MONGODB_URI.description: A secret String for Mongodb Connection.(Required)

SPACK_AUTHOR.description: Put Your Sticker Pack Author NAME here.
